text: I need to swap out some text on a footer, based off of the selected "office location", how would I go about doing this?
this is text that doesn't fit with the office location, but is required to be swapped out depending on the office selected.
Hey Chad, are you cloning one of the Default Site Search modules?
If you DM me the module, we can take a look

Hey so the tags are considered search relevancy boosts and if there are any other posts with the tags provided, they will definitely be returned. The tags are not “required” in which case we compare the body of the blog posts to each other to find related ones.

okay, thanks for the explanantion.
And is there any way to force or limit to display based tags match?

I am considering the situation where now I force to hide the unrelated post (that is within a different tag) and later in the future I try to display 2 posts and one of the false positive related is taking the place of another that could be there

You could provide a formatter which checks the tags to make sure they are the ones you want
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/creating-a-related-post-listing>

yeah thats how I will avoid the false positive, but then I have to also consider that this can happen and ask for some extra posts to make sure I display the right amount :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks for your help
